description: [Versa Director Zero Day Exploitation](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0039) involved exploitation of a vulnerability in Versa Director servers, since identified as CVE-2024-39717, for initial access and code execution.(Citation: Lumen Versa 2024)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2024, August 27). Taking The Crossroads: The Versa Director Zero-Day Exploitaiton. Retrieved August 27, 2024.
